Metadata.Title: CVE-2022-21698 affecting package node-problem-detector for versions less than 0.8.10-19
Metadata.Description: CVE-2022-21698 affecting package node-problem-detector for versions less than 0.8.10-19. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package node-problem-detector is earlier than 0.8.10-19, affected by CVE-2022-21698
